title: Did a Firearms-Trained Teacher Accidentally Discharge a Gun in a Classroom, Injuring a Student?
subtitle: The accidental handgun firing in California was one of two such incidents at schools in the United States one day before scheduled student walkouts across the nation to protest gun violence.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A teacher trained in the use of firearms accidentally discharged a handgun in a California classroom, causing minor injury to a student.
